description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，中国共产党党员，曾任中央政府驻澳门联络办公室协调部部长，第十一、十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China and a member of the Communist Party of China. He served as the Minister of the Coordination Department of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in Macao and was a member of the 11th and 12th National Committees of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 中国的主体民族及世界上人口最多的族群。
description.en: The dominant ethnic group in China and the most populous ethnic group in the world.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，通常简称为“中国”。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia, often referred to as 'China'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的创立者和唯一执政党。
description.en: The founder and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中央政府驻澳门联络办

zh-cn: 中央政府驻澳门联络办
en: Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Macao Special Administrative Region

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府驻澳门特别行政区的代表机构。
description.en: The representative office of the Central People's Government of the People's Republic of China in the Macao Special Administrative Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会
en: 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十一届全国委员会，于2008年至2013年履职。
description.en: The 11th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, which served from 2008 to 2013.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会
en: 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议的第十二届全国委员会，于2013年至2018年履职。
description.en: The 12th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, which served from 2013 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 由中国共产党领导的全国性社会团体，旨在加强海内外中华儿女的联系与团结。
description.en: A national social organization led by the Communist Party of China, aiming to strengthen connections and unity among Chinese people at home and abroad.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，许爽的民族为汉族。
description.en: According to the text, Xu Shuang is of Han ethnicity.

description.zh-cn: 许爽是中华人民共和国的一位政治人物。
description.en: Xu Shuang was a political figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 许爽是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Xu Shuang was a member of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.target: 中央政府驻澳门联络办

description.zh-cn: 许爽曾担任中央政府驻澳门联络办公室协调部部长。
description.en: Xu Shuang formerly served as the Minister of the Coordination Department of the Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in Macao.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十一届全国委员会

position.en: Committee Member (Specially Invited Personage from Macao)

description.zh-cn: 2008年1月25日，许爽当选为第十一届全国政协委员，代表特邀澳门人士，分入第五十四组。
description.en: On January 25, 2008, Xu Shuang was elected as a member of the 11th National Committee of the CPPCC, representing specially invited personages from Macao and assigned to the 54th group.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议第十二届全国委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面分类，许爽也是第十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia page category, Xu Shuang was also a member of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科页面导航模板和分类，许爽曾担任中华海外联谊会常务理事。
description.en: According to the Wikipedia page navigation template and category, Xu Shuang served as a Standing Council Member of the China Overseas Friendship Association.
